cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid value will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper gNB identification and setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting PUSCH antenna ports to zero will invalidate the uplink antenna configuration and prevent proper uplink transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PUSCH 天線端口設定為零會使上行鏈路天線配置無效，並阻止正確的上行鏈路傳輸設定。
